member.name: T:SeriesProblem.Program
member.summary: This is the driver class for this project.

member.name: M:SeriesProblem.Program.DetermineSeriesNTerms(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines each term in the series that is specified by the user when the user provides values for a, b, and n
member.param: Input to represent the number of terms to limit
